@TheLawofWork 4) aggregating at a national level overlooks the vast differences between states and provinces. Look at Massachusetts or Vermont vs Alberta.
5) ignoring social determinants of health obscures in-country inequality. Race and occupation make a big difference.

@TheLawofWork Still....the language of restrictions vs protections. Sigh
